After this class you will be able to 

- illustrate regression with dummy variables in words, pictures, and equations
- explain the importance of carfeul variable names when working with dummy variables
- illustrate regressions with interactions between a continuous variable and a dummy variable in words, pictures, and equations
- identify substantive research questions that involve dummy variables
- identify substantive research questions that involve interactions between a continuous variable and a dummy variable
